body: Hi Sylwia, For complex geometries it's always better to use MSH2RAD component for daylighting studies. One of the breps was making oconv to crash. Check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3FLLVGZOVWLFNUDrIJ1d8JxRdQiEzZQ8M20-N0MjiYhQZFfF4BtM5iNm5H2uNCIQTPj59RHZfhpu6rvx9ITRGkQKiuyI*bpA/MR.png) PS: Thanks Elzine for the note!
